info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 21 at 6:58AM CDT until July 21 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS St Louis MO
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...Portions of southwest Illinois, including the following county, Monroe and east central Missouri, including the following county, northern Jefferson.
* WHEN...Until 1000 AM CDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 658 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 2 and 3.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Arnold, Festus, Eureka, Waterloo, Columbia, Pevely, Crystal City, Red Bud, Herculaneum, Hillsboro, Byrnes Mill, Barnhart, Antonia, Oakville, Mehlville, Murphy, High Ridge, Cedar Hill, Valmeyer and Cedar Hill Lakes. - This includes the following State Parks... Mastodon Historic Site, Sandy Creek Covered Bridge Historic Site and Gov. Dunklin's Grave Historic Site.
This includes Interstate 55 in Missouri between exits 174 and 191.
info.instruction: Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CDT THIS MORNING... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING
